title: Interpretation of a dream about long hair for different occasions

preview.html: Many people search on social media for the interpretation of a dream about long hair and see it in a dream that they see during sleep and they cannot interpret it. Whoever sees this dream wonders whether its interpretation has good or bad effects, so in the following article, the encyclopedia of interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream is presented according to the interpretation of dream scholars and the various social positions of the Prophet. Interpretation of a dream about long hair: The scholar Ibn Sirin says about seeing long hair in a dream with the following interpretations: Seeing long black hair in a dream indicates the blessings and goodness that God has granted them. Thick, soft hair in a dream indicates that the dreamer enjoys physical strength and good health. Whoever has If a sick person sees in his dream that his hair has grown longer and longer, this means that he will be cured by God’s will. Long curly hair in a dream symbolizes the problems and psychological pain that the dreamer feels. Interpretation of a dream about thick hair for a single woman. We present below different meanings of seeing single women with long hair in a dream: Hair Long hair in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes her honesty and loyalty, which is known to those around her. Seeing unmarried women with long hair in a dream means happiness, longevity, and great living. The length and density of an unmarried woman’s hair in a dream indicates the purity of her heart, kindness, and good morals. Seeing an unmarried woman For a man combing her hair indicates that she will marry a person of good character. Cutting long hair in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes sadness after happiness and deception by someone close to her heart. Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a married woman: Seeing long hair in a married woman’s dream is a praiseworthy dream. We refer to its interpretation in the following points: Long, straight hair in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes marital happiness and the protection of her family from God Almighty. For a married woman to see that her hair is longer than it actually is, this means that her condition will change for the better and that she will rest after fatigue and sadness. Long hair In a married woman’s dream, it indicates pregnancy and childbirth soon. While seeing long hair cut in a married woman’s dream is a bad omen because it indicates the inability to have children, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of a dream about long hair for a divorced woman? Here is the interpretation of seeing a divorced woman with long hair in The dream is as follows: Seeing a divorced woman with long hair in a dream indicates happiness and abundance in the afterlife. A divorced woman seeing a man combing her hair indicates that a suitable man will propose to marry her. Seeing her ex-husband running his hand through her long hair indicates His regret over their separation and his desire to return to her. Long hair for men in a dream. God Almighty forbids a man to grow his hair long because of imitating women. As for a man who sees long hair in a dream, the interpretation is as follows: Long hair in a man’s dream indicates coverage and success in professional and social life. Seeing a girl with long hair in a man's dream indicates a close marriage with a family of origin

Seeing a girl with long hair in a man's dream indicates a close marriage with a family of origin

title: Interpretation of a dream about the living visiting the dead in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the living visiting the dead in a dream Seeing the living visiting the dead in a dream is one of the recurring visions that preoccupies the minds of many. They are also often confused in its interpretation and the dreamer does not know whether it brings good or evil and what its meaning is, but it is like all visions. It can be beneficial to one person, and at the same time seeing it is harmful to another person, and this depends on the circumstances of the viewer and the nature of his life, as well as on the context in which the events of the vision take place. It takes place.Interpretation: The living visit the dead in a dream. A dream about death and consolation indicates that the dreamer has fallen short in his religion. He must review some of his actions and return to God. Dreaming of death and then life indicates that the dreamer will commit some sins. But he will repent to God Almighty and return to her. A dream about the death of a king indicates that the dreamer’s city or town will go through a strong crisis, and this crisis may destroy it. A dream about dying without a reason indicates that the dreamer will gain longevity and goodness and repent or repent for sins and gain goodness in the period Next. A dream about the death of a son indicates that the dreamer will get rid of his enemy, and God knows best. A dream about a girl’s death indicates that the dreamer will limit his livelihood or despair of comfort and kindness. A dream about dying without clothes also indicates that the dreamer will lose a lot of his money until he becomes poor. He says Some interpreters: If a living person sees a dead person in a dream, the dreamer abandons praying for the dead person, so he visits the living dead person and warns him to return to pray for him and do some good deeds for him. If the living person goes through some problems and circumstances. Seeing the deceased in a dream bodes well and getting rid of some problems, but on the condition that the dead person’s face is bright, beautiful and smiling. If the living person is suffering from some health problems that he cannot deal with or if he is desperate to recover. Visiting the deceased with a radiant face and smiling at him in a dream indicates a short recovery and freedom from these health problems. If a widow sees that her deceased husband visited her in her dream, the woman suffers from living difficulties and poor social conditions. This indicates that her life will change, she will get rid of distress, her life will improve and her circumstances will improve. If there is a person suffering from some problems and disagreements, whether with his family or with his relatives, and he sees the living dead visiting him in a dream. This indicates getting rid of problems and the collapse of disputes between families. , or the dreamer and those who are hostile to him, and good circumstances later. If the dreamer owes some money that he cannot pay and does not have money to pay it, seeing a dead person visiting him in a dream means that this debt will end and worry will go away, God willing. And if the dreamer has some hopes and aspirations that he seeks and hopes that May God grant him success in his investigation. He saw that a dead man with a smiling face was visiting him in a dream. This indicates that this person will achieve great success and reach his goals and aspirations and that God will guide them on their path.If you see the dead person talking or saying something to the monarch. Usually what the dead person says is true, because the dead person is now in his true home, but we live in a house of lies. Interpretation of someone who sees himself dead in manna

title: Learn the interpretation of drinking Zamzam water in a dream on the authority of Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Drinking Zamzam water in a dream Zamzam water is one of the positive symbols in the world of dreams that the dreamer is happy to see and its interpretations portend many good things and blessings for the vision, and in this article we will talk about the interpretation of seeing Zamzam water on the lips of Ibn Sirin and the leading interpretation scholars. Drinking Zamzam water in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of drinking Zamzam water in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about drinking Zamzam water is good and indicates happiness and contentment. If the dreamer is poor, then the dream indicates that his financial conditions will improve and that he will soon become rich. However, if he is sick, the vision promises him that his health will improve and that he will soon become wealthy. . Healthy. A single person’s dream foretells his marriage to a kind and charming woman whose beauty is unparalleled. He lives with her the most beautiful moments and enjoys the best things in life with her. However, if he is married, the dream portends good news for him. . Marital happiness and freedom from all the problems he faces in his personal life. It indicates the positive changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life due to travel, whether traveling for work or settling down. What is the interpretation of drinking Zamzam water in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin believes that the dream carries many omens. Because it foretells success, satisfaction of desires, loss of anxiety, and relief from anxiety, and that the coming days in his life will make the dreamer happy and make him forget his pain and sorrows in the past. An indication that the dreamer will assume an important position in his current job or that he will leave his job soon and work in a better job than him, but if the dreamer He is sick and sees himself drinking Zamzam water in his dream. This indicates a short period of recovery and his return to a healthy and full body as he was before. If the dreamer is going through financial hardship, then the dream brings him good news about his livelihood and an increase in money and that he will soon be able to pay off his debts that he owes. It was causing him stress and stealing sleep from his eyes. The unit includes Interpretation of dreams on an Egyptian website. From Google, you can see many interpretations and questions about followers. Drinking Zamzam water in a dream for unmarried women. Interpretation of drinking Zamzam water in a dream for an unmarried woman promises her a close marriage to a good man who has a good heart. He makes her happy, treats her with kindness and kindness, and lives with him in the most beautiful days of her life. An indication of success and success in her professional life and that she will soon be able to achieve her goals that she has been seeking for a long time, but if she is facing a health problem in the current period, the vision indicates the end of this problem. She says She is intelligent and educated and benefits people with her knowledge and extensive experience in life and her dreams as a message to her telling her not to envy people with her knowledge and to make efforts to educate and educate people so that he obtains the approval of God (the Most High) and obtains his love. It indicates that she will soon hear good news about a friend of hers, and the vision shows the purity of her heart and honesty She is innocent, does not know how to lie, and does not pretend. Perhaps the dream is a warning to adhere to these good qualities and not let life’s difficulties change them. The vision heralds her an answer to a certain petition she was requesting from God (mighty and majestic) for some time.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing olive oil in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see olive oil in a dream, the symbol of green olive oil in a dream for a single, married, pregnant woman and a man, the meaning of spilling olive oil, the effects of olive oil on the dead, seeing... olive oil and thyme, the interpretation of olive oil in a dream, and olive oil is one of the most important oils Natural because of its importance and benefits in treating many diseases in reality, but when you see it in a dream, it will certainly have many meanings and signs that will deal with the interpretation of seeing olive oil in detail in a dream according to the most important jurists and scholars. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin seeing olive oil: Interpretation of a dream Olive oil in a dream, as the distinguished scholar Ibn Sirin explained, is a praiseworthy vision that shows that everything is changing for the better. Seeing olive oil in a dream is evidence of recovery from illness, removal of fears, elimination of problems, consolation after distress and repentance of sins. The dream Who gave olive oil in a dream means that I receive good news, frequent happy occasions, and good luck. Dreaming that you eat bread and olive oil in a dream, this indicates wealth, prosperity, a decent life, a prosperous life, and a feeling of happiness. Dreaming of seeing olive oil falling on the ground in a dream is a sign of... Distress, distress, lack of livelihood, and lack of money. Interpretation of seeing olive oil for a single woman: Interpretation of seeing olive oil in a dream for a single woman is a good omen for her as the date of her engagement and marriage approaches with a good person and a good man. The dream of putting olive oil on the hair in the dream of an unmarried woman is a sign of Good luck, fulfillment of desires and ambitions, and success in work and study. Seeing a bottle of olive oil in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she is a good, pious, kind-hearted girl, characterized by purity and chastity. Interpretation of seeing olive oil for a married woman: Interpretation of a dream about olive oil in the kitchen in a woman’s dream For a married woman, it indicates blessings, abundant living, and goodness for her and her entire family. Seeing cooking food in a married woman’s dream is an indication of hearing happy news, frequent happy occasions, and good luck for her and her family. Dreaming of buying olive oil in a dream for a married woman indicates that the husband will be promoted in his job, and it will reach... The highest positions and gets a lot of money. Dreaming of seeing olive oil on clothes in a dream for a married woman is an unfortunate vision that indicates that something bad will happen to her. Seeing a gift of olive oil in a dream for a married woman is evidence that she will receive a great benefit through inheritance or her own work. Interpretation of seeing olive oil for a pregnant woman: The dream of applying olive oil to the body in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an easy and natural birth and guarantees her and the safety of her fetus. Seeing him distributing olive oil to a pregnant woman in a dream indicates the blessing of the new baby and that he will be good offspring obedient to his parents. Interpretation Seeing olive oil for a man: Dreaming of seeing a man drinking olive oil in a dream is evidence of health, well-being, longevity, and recovery from all diseases. To dream courageously of eating olive oil

title: What is the interpretation of a white dress for a married woman?

preview.html: A white married dress is one of the visions that indicate many different meanings and connotations, and it carries signs of goodness, happiness, and joy. It may express the problems and sorrows that the dreamer experiences in his real life, and this depends on his social and psychological life. The dreamer’s situation and the nature of his dream. The white dress of a married woman. The dream of a wedding dress in a woman’s dream is evidence of her good relationship with her husband and that she does many things that bring happiness and joy to the dreamer’s heart and a strong sign of gentle and kind treatment between them. If the white dress appears impure, this indicates the seriousness of her jealousy toward her husband. And her harsh treatment, and she needs to act better and change for the better so as not to lose him again. The white dress of the married wife of Ibn Sirin. The dream of a dress in a woman’s dream is interpreted as a sign of kindness and happiness in her future life and the strength of the bond between her family. The dreamer is wearing a green, wedding dress, and she was Happy in a dream, which indicates pregnancy after a long period of patience and endurance, and the presence of blood on the white dress is an unpleasant dream that shows bad signs that show feelings of sadness and remorse for past mistakes that affect the present in a negative way. A white dress for a married pregnant woman. For a pregnant woman, the Dreaming of a white dress is evidence of the end of the pain and problems she faced at the beginning of pregnancy and the improvement of her health condition. A wedding dress in a dream for the dreaming woman is an indication of an easy birth without feeling very tired, and if the dress is pink, this is a sign of some honest and fair friends who bring the dreamer’s love. They provide her with support and assistance. A blue wedding dress is a sign of the health of a male child. Dreaming of wearing a white dress for a married woman: Wearing a white dress for a married woman indicates the end of problems and getting rid of the worries and sorrows that afflicted the dreamer in the previous period. She lost valuable things in the coming period, and God knows best. Wearing a white dress in a dream is a sign that her financial situation will change for the better in the near future, as she receives a financial grant or inheritance from someone close to her and sees a married woman wearing loose white. Her life and her cover in all her affairs. Interpretation of a dream about marriage and wearing a white dress for a married woman: A woman’s vision of someone marrying her and wearing a white dress indicates many positive things that will happen in her life in the coming period. Get a lot of money in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about a bride in a white dress for a married woman: One of the dreams that has many interpretations is the dream of a bride wearing a white dress in a married woman’s dream, as it shows the beauty of the situation and covering in general, and is an indication of the joy and stability that he enjoys. with her. Her partner, and the white dress indicates the end of problems and disagreements and the enjoyment of calm and a happy life. If the dreamer prefers to wear white clothes in her life, the dream is an indication that she will get rid of all the problems and suffering that she faces in her life and achieve peace.

title: Learn about the interpretation of the dream of surgery by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a job: The operation takes place by entering the operating room and the doctor cures the patient from the disease he suffers from. Whoever watches the operation in his dream feels anxious and afraid about the meaning of this dream and accelerates research and questioning about it. Different meanings and interpretations, and this we will explain in detail in the following lines of the article. Interpretation of a dream about a job: The operation in a dream has many interpretations, the most important of which is to explain through the following: Whoever sees in his dream that he has undergone an operation and left some marks on his body, this is a sign of... God - Glory be to Him - will open more than one door for him. Seeing surgery during sleep suggests that the dreamer is suffering from many problems and crises and does not feel comfortable at all, but soon he will feel calm and happy. The jurists explained that a person’s dream of undergoing surgery symbolizes that he is surrounded by good friends. They are characterized by generosity, love, and tenderness, and they seek to create a social project to help people and provide job opportunities that generate good income for them. Interpretation of a Dream Asrar is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just write. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s intervention. Explain the sign. The great Muhammad Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - said that the interpretation of a dream about work has many interpretations, the most prominent of which are the following: If a man or young man sees in a dream that he underwent surgery and left a wound on his right hand, then this is an extensive diet on his way to him. If a woman dreams or If a girl dreams that she underwent surgery due to an injury to her left hand, then God will carry her or she will receive a lot of money. Whoever sees in his dream that he is in the operating room and undergoing surgery on his left hand, this will lead to the arrival of a source of livelihood from agricultural work that will bring a large profit. When a person dreams of performing surgery on his back, this is a sign that he has received or earned money through a parent or a family member. Interpretation of a dream about surgery for a single woman: If a girl dreams that she is in the operating room for an operation, this is a sign that she will excel academically and obtain the highest grades. If this process is present in her stomach, this symbolizes that all the secrets she is hiding from those around her will soon be revealed. When a single woman sees in a dream that she is undergoing surgery in the hospital, this is a sign of many transformations in her life, even if she is at home. , these changes will not be complete. If an unmarried woman feels pain and discomfort while undergoing surgery in her dream, this indicates the crises she is facing, causing her sadness and depression. Interpretation of a dream about surgery for a married woman When a woman discovers in her dream that she is undergoing surgery, this is a sign However, she is facing major crises in her life and is trying hard to get rid of them. If she sees herself undergoing brain surgery, these fears control her thinking and prevent her from feeling comfortable and happy or from being able to make good decisions in her life. title: Interpretation of seeing a mosque in a dream Entering a mosque in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the mosque for a single and married woman. For a pregnant woman, sitting and cleaning the Ibn Sirin Mosque. Seeing the entire mosque indicates justice, goodness, and the remembrance of God Almighty. The demolition of the mosque indicates the death of a well-known religion. Building the mosque indicates the connection of kinship and the gathering of people in goodness, and it also indicates victory over the enemies. A vision as if the imam of the mosque is not Who is he really? The dream may indicate the death of the imam, the imam. Seeing your house transformed into a mosque means honor and calling people to the truth. Whoever digs a hole in the mosque in his sleep will get married. Whoever dreams of covering a mosque, then supports the orphans, and the longer he stays in the mosque, the more his kindness and good will His morals. Converting the shop into a mosque suggests the existence of a dream to earn a living. Abandoned mosques indicate the negligence of scholars and abrogation of enjoining good and forbidding evil. Whoever dreams that he entered the mosque and worshiped Whoever dreams of his death in the mosque announces victory over the enemies. Entering the Sacred Mosque is safe from fear and the promise is real. If you see the mosque’s carpet cut or it was involved in an accident. The dream indicates a calamity in the family. The mosque in a dream generally indicates a wise man who knows the affairs of this world and life. Whoever sees in a dream that he enters an incomplete mosque, this indicates the good that he hopes to do for those close to him and the great help that he needs. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he He enters a mosque full of people and worshipers, this indicates the goodness and profits that he will achieve in the coming days. Whoever dreams during his sleep that he enters a mosque, and notices that the mosque is collapsing around him, then this is a sign of death surrounding him and it may affect a relative of him or a member of his family. If the dreamer sees During his sleep, he enters a mosque without a roof, this is a sign of the accumulation of work that he must complete in the coming period before it accumulates more. Whoever dreams that he enters the mosque with some of his companions, this indicates a close marriage that will be celebrated in the near future in an atmosphere of happiness and joy. If a person dreams that he is entering the mosque and the mosque is a new building, then this is an indication of the Hajj and prayers that he must perform in the current year of the dream or the next. If the dreamer sees that he is entering the mosque through the wide door, then this is a sign of the good things that he hopes for in the future. The coming days, whether professional, family, or social. Interpretation of a dream about a mosque: Whoever sees a mosque in a dream, this is evidence that the doors of goodness will be opened for him, and God Almighty will overwhelm him, and the dreamer’s fame will be good for many people. He sees in a dream that he died inside the mosque, then this is evidence that he will pay his debt and repent to God Almighty for one of the sins he committed, and defeat one of his enemies and triumph over them. Interpretation of a dream about a mosque in a single woman’s dreamWhen an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she enters the mosque and begins to perform ablution or Praying in it, this is evidence that she will soon marry a righteous man who knows her religion well and cares about God within her. Good manners, and she will be happy with this blessed marriage that brings her many positives in her upcoming married life. Interpretation of a dream about a mosque for a married woman and a married woman who entered into marriage.

title: Interpretation of seeing itikaf in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing i'tikaf in a dream through a website. Looking at the website roy2a.com, the meaning of i'tikaf in the language is abandonment, confinement, distance from worldly life and its desires, complete loyalty to the people of the Almighty Lord, and drawing closer to Him through worship, prayer, and loyalty. Itkaf’s visions. According to the details from one person to another, we mention in this topic the most important sayings of major dream interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Shaheen and others on this topic, so follow along. We.Interpretation of seeing i'tikaf in a dream. Watching i'tikaf in the mosque during sleep. A good vision shows the strength of faith and the fear of God. Seeing i'tikaf in the sanctuary. The dreamer will enjoy visiting the House of God. As for seeing i'tikaf in the Prophet's Mosque? It indicates the fulfillment of dreams and the following are very good for the fortuneteller. Seeing i'tikaf in a dream indicates For the debtor, in the near future relief and solution to torment. Seeing someone performing ablution and secluding themselves in a dream indicates the loss of sorrows, problems, and almost joy. Seeing a man isolated in church indicates the evil of his wife and her lack of kindness. Seeing seclusion in the sanctuary in relation to the precious state of faith that the Lord enjoys. Seeing supplication and seclusion in a sick person’s dream in his misery. Nearby, God willing. See also: The supplication of the last night of Ramadan is written and answered. The interpretation of itikaf in a dream by Ibn Sirini. Ibn Shirin says that seeing itikaf in a dream indicates the closeness of the dreamer to his Lord through obedience and good deeds. It is also considered a dream for the righteous in itikaf, a signification of goodness and benefits. Seeing itikaf in the dream of an unmarried young man This indicates that he is approaching his marriage to a girl on morals and religion. Seeing itikaf at work during sleep indicates that the dreamer is putting his best efforts and time into work. See also: Interpretation of seeing praying in the mosque in a dream. Interpretation of seeing itikaf in a dream for a single woman. Seeing itikaf in one dream is an indication of good news. And the upcoming livelihood and changes in her life for the better. Seeing itikaf in the mosque is an indication for an unmarried woman. Until her marriage approaches, she will be a person of good character and belief. The meaning of seeing ablution and i’tikaf in a dream is that she will get what she desires and her life will be one of happiness, satisfaction and pleasures. Interpretation of seeing itikaf in a dream for a married woman: seeing itikaf in a dream The dream of a married woman is an indication of the happy life and the financial life that she enjoys and increases in goodness and blessing. Seeing a married woman secluding herself in the mosque indicates the news of her upcoming pregnancy. Also, a vision of prayer and seclusion in a married woman’s dream is an indication of changes in her life for the better and the fulfillment of her desires. Seeing supplication and reverence in a married woman’s dream is an indicator. On the collapse of her worries and problems from her life, the crises she is going through, and the return of comfort. See also: Interpretation of seeing praying in church in a dream. Interpretation of seeing itikaf in a pregnant woman’s dream. Seeing itikaf in a pregnant woman’s dream. A good vision portends the cessation of fatigue, pain, and difficulties due to her pregnancy. Seeing supplication and i’tikaf in a pregnant woman’s dream. This indicates that she will have a smooth and easy birth, and she and her fetus will be fine. Itikaf in Al-Ham Mosque

title: Interpretation of seeing a gift of honey in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of giving honey in a dream by Ibn Sirin in correct detail of interpretations. Honey is one of the delicious foods with a sweet taste that one can enjoy eating without fear of high sugars in the body or obesity, as they are easy sugars. For digestion, seeing a gift of honey in a dream is a beautiful dream that contains a lot of goodness for the one who gave the gift and to whom the gift was given, so in this article we will tell you the interpretation of giving honey to the dream according to Ibn Sirin in correct detail of interpretations. Interpretation of dreams of seeing honey being given in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, says the great scholar. Muhammad Ibn Sirin in his book Interpretation of Dreams states that honey in a dream indicates the wonderful food that one enjoys. If you see a gift of honey in a dream, this means that you will soon hear good news. If one sees in his dream that he is buying honey and giving it as a gift to others, this is a good vision that indicates that the dreamer is a pious and moral person who seeks to be satisfied. The vision of buying honey to give it As a gift to people, it portends to the dreamer good luck and success in work. Interpretation of a dream in which you see giving honey in a dream to an unmarried woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that someone is giving her a gift of honey, then this dream indicates that there is someone who wants to marry her. A gift of honey in The dream of an unmarried girl heralds success and prosperity in her life and that God will guide her to achieve all the desires she seeks. Interpretation of the dream of seeing honey in a dream for a married womanDream interpretation scholars say that if a married woman in reality suffers from the inability to give birth and sees in a dream that she is receiving honey as a gift This is a good vision that warns her that the Lord will bestow it upon her. Pregnancy in the near future. Seeing a gift of honey in a married woman’s dream indicates the stability of her married life, which indicates a happy life free of trouble. If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband is giving her honey as a gift, this is a sign that her husband loves, respects and appreciates her. Interpretation of a dream Seeing giving honey in a dream to a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that someone is giving her honey as a gift, then this is a good vision that portends an easy birth without problems and pain, and God Almighty will preserve and protect her. All evil. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing honey bees in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that God is giving her a male. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a gift of honey in a dream for a man. Whoever sees in his dream that he is buying honey and then distributing it to people to feed them from it, this is evidence that the dreamer has Great knowledge and wisdom and people benefit from it. Knowing him. Seeing a gift of honey in a merchant’s dream foretells that he will obtain a great livelihood and a lot of money from his work. If an unmarried young man sees in his dream that he is receiving a gift of honey, this is good news that the date of his marriage to the girl is approaching morally and religiously. Dreams are a very natural phenomenon that can occur For any person, because the mind continues to work even though the person enters a state of deep sleep, that stage in which the mind begins to organize everything that causes an imbalance in its work during the day.

If an unmarried young man sees in his dream that he is receiving a gift of honey, this is good news that the date of his marriage to the girl is approaching morally and religiously. Dreams are a very natural phenomenon that can occur For any person, because the mind continues to work even though the person enters a state of deep sleep, that stage in which the mind begins to organize everything that causes an imbalance in its work during the day.
